scripts.sync: rsync -rtv build/ `head -n 1 .computerDirectory` && echo 'synced to computer!' || echo 'nothing to sync!'
scripts.sync:renameTests: find build -depth -name "*.test.lua" -exec sh -c 'f="{}"; mv -- "$f" "${f%.test.lua}.lua"' \; && yarn sync
scripts.sync:watch: while true; do find build -depth -name "*.lua" | entr -d yarn sync:renameTests; done
